admin/invoice-data-settings.title: Invoice form settings
admin/invoice-data-settings.subtitle: Here you can configure how the checkout's invoice form works
admin/invoice-data-settings.sdi-pec.info: If a default value is chosen, the input corresponding to that value will be shown to be completed by the client.
This section only affects the form for Italy.
If a default value is chosen, the input corresponding to that value will be shown to be completed by the client.
admin/invoice-data-settings.auto-name-su: Complete name and surname of the billing form with the data entered in the "personal data" section.
admin/invoice-data-settings.updating-sch: Please wait a moment while we create the configuration for this application. Once finished, please reload this page.
admin/invoice-data-settings.loading-sett: Please wait a moment while we retrieve your settings
